section.title: Overview
section.para: This module can delegate processing of SIP requests to a group of workers in the configuration file. The async workers have to defined with the global parameter.
It does not create the transaction and nor suspend it.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
None.

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para:
The following libraries or applications must be installed before running &kamailio; with this module loaded:
None
Return 1 (true) if the processing happens in an asyn process, or -1 (false) if the processing is happening in a SIP receiving process.
This function can be used from REQUEST_ROUTE|CORE_REPLY_ROUTE.
Delegate the processing of SIP message to a group of async workers.
The parameter gname provides the name of the group workers, it can contain pseudo-variables.
The function returns 0 (exit) in case the task is delegated.
This function can be used from REQUEST_ROUTE|CORE_REPLY_ROUTE.
